document.heading: NEW CONVENTION CENTER HOTEL OMNIBUS FINANCING AND DEVELOPMENT AMENDMENT ACT OF 2007.

history.narrative: Law 17-144, the “New Convention Center Hotel Omnibus Financing and Development Amendment Act of 2008”, was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 17-459 which was referred to the Committees on Economic Development and Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on January 8, 2008, and February 5, 2008, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on February 25, 2008, it was assigned Act No. 17-310 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 17-144 became effective on April 15, 2008.
